Bash.display_help: You perform a Bashing attack with your mace that deals moderate damage, and can sometimes Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Pulverize.display_help: You attempt to Pulverize your opponent. This attack is slower than Bash but causes more damage. It also has a chance of Disorienting your opponent for a brief time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Jawbreaker.display_help: This upward swing attempts to shatter your opponent's jaw, and has a chance to send him flying upwards into the air. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Clobber.display_help: You Clobber your foe with a massive swing of your mace. This attack deals exceptional damage and can leave most opponents disoriented for a period of time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Taunt.display_help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Whirling_Mace.display_help: You swing your mace in a circle all around you, attacking everyone in melee range. Your Whirling Mace deals moderate damage, and has a chance to Disorient every foe you hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Mace.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor Disorient

Shatter.display_help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Crowd_Control.display_help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage, and knocks them down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
